question: Which is true about the web container request processing model?

options.A: The init method on a filter is called the first time a servlet mapped to that filter is invoked.
options.B: A filter defined for a servlet must always forward control to the next resource in the filter chain.
options.C: Filters associated with a named servlet are applied in the order they appear in the web application deployment descriptor file.
options.D: If the init method on a filter throws an UnavailableException, then the container will make no further attempt to execute it.
